text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: Oguri Cap looks a bit down.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I don't know why, but I've been so tired<n>lately.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I'm eating well, and I'm not struggling<n>with any
particular issues...

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It seems like I've really exhausted her.<n>Maybe we
should rethink our race<n>schedule.
